Reviews.Content: Acceptable accommodation and nice staff As most Ibis Hotels, this one provides a good price - performance ratio. The location is a little outside the city center, but you can easily get into downtown Frankfurt by public transportation within about 20-30 minutes. A subway station is located in about 3-5 minutes walking distance from the hotel. No dining options in the neighborhood, but at the next subway station there are a few. The hotel building's architecture is ugly, the rooms clean and equipped with basic comfort. The bed is too small, but let's face it... it is an Ibis. There is a small bar in the hotel with friendly service serving drinks and some snacks. If you want to have acceptable food, go somewhere else. I can recommend staying there for 1-2 nights, but don't expect anything special.
Reviews.Author: Olli65
